name: Blink (itch) (durteeeoijedien)
description:
Ella wakes up trapped and terrified in her former co-worker's flat next to her partner's lifeless body with no memory of what just happened. 

Join her in this narrative adventure and solve the tragic event to unravel the secrets of a powerful corporation.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Playable Alpha-Demo tips:

- Left click: action
- Right click: return from camera view
- ALT: inventory (pick the item when Ella is looking at the object for using)
- i: turn on/off UV light (after you take it)

Credits:

  • Game Designer - Sergio Martin
  • Audio Desginer - Sergio Martin
  • Assets and props Director - Javier Baron
  • Programmer Designer - Sergio Martin


Blink is a personal and independent game that is being developed by 2 people for some months. Below you can find a download link with some gameplay alpha with one of the levels that we created for the story. We have plans for including more mechanics and storylines to complete this experience.
We hope you enjoy.

Thank you for Playing !
